name: Inflate
description:
Blow into your microphone and watch videogame characters fly away.

Currently using assets from:
Sin and Punishment Star Successor
Star Wars Battlefront
Counter-Strike
Scarlet Blade Queens Blade Online

gathered on http://www.models-resource.com/

Melting technique via Hugo Slade: https://gist.github.com/glitchersgames/2dce921fef7...
